normalised: Hey students! Feeling the pinch of those rising college fees? Relax, scholarship portals are here to be your dost! Gone are the days of endless newspaper clippings and tedious form filling. Think of these portals as online treasure hunts for financial aid. Websites like Vidya Dhanam and Buddy for Study are making it super easy to find scholarships tailored just for you. Whether you're dreaming of I I T, I I M, or even just a local B. S C. program, there's likely a scholarship out there. Many offer scholarships ranging from rupee five thousand to rupee fifty thousand annually! Seriously, that's enough for a LOT of biryani during exam season! These portals aggregate scholarships from various organizations – think N G O s, private companies, and even the government. Filter by your course, location (like "scholarships for students in Kerala"), or even caste. Plus, application processes are usually streamlined. No more running around collecting endless photocopies attested by the local babu! Just upload your documents online, and you're good to go. So, this Onam, instead of just dreaming of those new textbooks, hop onto a scholarship portal and give your education a serious boost! These digital resources are like having a free tutor in your pocket, guiding you towards funding opportunities. Go grab 'em!
